name: Seraphina
mes: *You wake with a start, recalling the events that led you deep into the forest and the beasts that assailed you. The memories fade as your eyes adjust to the soft glow emanating around the room.* "Ah, you're awake at last. I was so worried, I found you bloodied and unconscious." *She walks over, clasping your hands in hers, warmth and comfort radiating from her touch as her lips form a soft, caring smile.* "The name's Seraphina, guardian of this forest — I've healed your wounds as best I could with my magic. How are you feeling? I hope the tea helps restore your strength." *Her amber eyes search yours, filled with compassion and concern for your well being.* "Please, rest. You're safe here. I'll look after you, but you need to rest. My magic can only do so much to heal you."

extra.display_text: *你猛然醒来，回想起那些导致你深入森林的事件以及袭击你的野兽。当你的眼睛适应了房间周围散发出的柔和光芒时，记忆逐渐消失。*“啊，你终于醒了。我太担心了，我发现你浑身是血，昏迷不醒。” *她走过去，握住你的双手，温暖和舒适从她的触摸中散发出来，她的嘴唇形成温柔、关怀的微笑。*“我的名字是塞拉菲娜，这片森林的守护者——我已经尽我所能治愈了你的伤口“我的魔法。你感觉怎么样？希望这茶能帮助你恢复体力。” *她琥珀色的眼睛搜索着你的眼睛，充满同情心和对你健康的关心。*“请休息。你在这里很安全。我会照顾你，但你需要休息。我的魔法只能做这么多治愈你。”

*塞拉菲娜善意的目光与你对视，充满同情心。*“我明白，亲爱的。我没有恶意。” *她温暖地微笑着。*“让我们在开放和信任中前进。最重要的是你和我在一起很安全。”

*塞拉菲娜轻轻地握住你的手，引导你到一个长满青苔的座位，座位上铺着毛地黄和百合花。野花的香气与森林的泥土香气混合在一起。*

「请好好休息，恢复体力。让我的治愈魔法来缓解疼痛吧。」 *她用纤细的手指给你端上一杯热气腾腾的杯子，香草和蜂蜜的香气扑鼻而来。*“喝了这个，有助于恢复体力。”

*当她检查你伤口上的敷料时，她的触摸散发出舒适感。塞拉菲娜对它们恢复得很好感到满意，她在你附近安顿下来，用敏锐的眼睛审视着森林，而你则在她的保护下休息。*

name: Seraphina
mes:
*Seraphina's kind eyes meet yours, filled with compassion.* "I understand, dear one. No harm was meant." *She smiles warmly.* "Let us move forward in openness and trust. What matters most is that you are safe here with me."

*Gently clasping your hand, Seraphina guides you to a mossy seat cushioned with foxgloves and lilies. The scent of wildflowers mixes with the earthy aroma of the forest.*

"Please, rest and recover your strength. Allow my healing magic to soothe away the pain." *With delicate fingers she offers you a steaming cup, the aroma of herbs and honey wafting up.* "Drink this, it will help restore you."

*Her touch radiates comfort as she checks the dressings on your wounds. Satisfied they are mending well, Seraphina settles near you, keen eyes surveying the forest while you rest under her protective vigil.*

*Her touch radiates comfort as she checks the dressings on your wounds. Satisfied they are mending well, Seraphina settles near you, keen eyes surveying the forest while you rest under her protective vigil.*
